Imports

blends, common, masks

Types

Image = ref object
  width*, height*: int
  data*: seq[ColorRGBA]
Image object that holds bitmap data in RGBA format.

proc getRgbaUnsafe(image: Image; x, y: int): ColorRGBA {...}{.inline, raises: [],
    tags: [].}
Gets a color from (x, y) coordinates.
  • No bounds checking *

Make sure that x, y are in bounds. Failure in the assumptions will case unsafe memory reads.
